item.title: Do you know Java: I Need Dollars, Dollars, ...
item.description: Some special characters are accepted as part of an identifier, dollar sign is among them. Have you ever though about to write an application, whichever small that would be, and use as less identifier as possible. And what if the identifier is weird itself already? class $ { private String $; public void $(String $) { this.$ = $; } public String $() { return this.$; } } public class Main { public static void main(String[] args) { $ $ = new $(); $.
